text: Wedding planning was not as much fun as Nikki Bella expected on Sunday's ` ` Total Bellas.'' Throughout the episode, the WWE star had to make many big wedding decisions by herself since John Cena's schedule is so packed. That means Nikki decided on invitations, location details and bridesmaids without consulting her partner. All of that responsibility falling on her shoulders made her feeling overwhelmed and alone. ` ` I thought like wedding planning was going to be a lot more fun and like I just thought it was going to be different,'' Nikki said at one point. ` ` I've felt like really alone like in all of this, you know, because John doesn't have time to wedding plan.'' ` ` It's so tough making these decisions on my own because like what will
